description: This Python script interacts with an AI agent to generate an image based on a text prompt, then displays the resulting images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of generating responses based on a model.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from the agent's run method, potentially containing images.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class for the Google Gemini AI model used for image generation.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt, streaming the response.

methods.name: Image.open
methods.description: Opens an image from a byte stream.

methods.name: image.show
methods.description: Displays the image to the user.
